document_name_accent: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json
document_title: Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS): Symptoms and treatment
subsection_content:
Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) is not life-threatening, however, if you have been diagnosed with DCIS, you have a higher risk of developing invasive breast cancer than the general population. .
DCIS is considered the earliest form of breast cancer, is non-invasive and has a low risk of becoming invasive.
subsection_title: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Is ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) dangerous?
subsection_data:
ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Is ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) dangerous?
Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) is not life-threatening, however, if you have been diagnosed with DCIS, you have a higher risk of developing invasive breast cancer than the general population. .
DCIS is considered the earliest form of breast cancer, is non-invasive and has a low risk of becoming invasive.
